item.title: UCL Induction Week Hackathon "Our World in Crisis"
item.description: “We struggle to close the feedback loop on issues in real-time. We need to increase our transparency and accountability to our stakeholders and be responsive to issues they raise quickly.” -Oxfam GB This project tackles Oxfam’s Accountability problem in terms of transparency and accountability to stakeholders and responsiveness to real-time issues. “Any technical solution would need to consider ease of use, accessibility and scalability, as well as the reality of survey fatigue.
